column2: Gallery Soolip is in the Pacific Design Center NOT on Norwich
column3: Gallery Soolip is in the Pacific Design Center 8687 Melrose Ave. "The Blue Whale" [NOT on Norwich and has not been for about 2 years! call 310.360.1055 for detailed instructions, but basically, park the the PDC garage, and then the attendant will help with info to the store. EXCELLENT paper products of all kinds. Unique wrapping paper and paper products. Most Excellent Wedding supplies and stationary. A favorite for gifts for a SPECIAL person. If you catch a sale, load up! Because their prices are pricey. I pop in frequently in hopes of catching sale items.
